name: Romanian Investor Relations Association
memberOrga: The founding members are Bucharest Stock Exchange, ALRO, Franklin Templeton Management - Bucharest Branch, Electromagnetica, Hidroelectrica, Nuclearelectrica, Teraplast, Transelectrica.
goal: Romanian Investor Relations Association (ARIR) is a non-governmental and non-profit organization that was set-up in November 2018 with the purpose to provide current and potential issuers a platform for the development of Investor Relations (IR) professionals and contribute to the implementation of best practices in investor communication and corporate governance. The founding members of the association are Bucharest Stock Exchange, Romanian listed companies, those with potential to become listed companies, fund managers and Investor Relations (IR) professionals.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Single market
euInitiatives:
All EU initiatives related to capital markets, financial and non-financial reporting of listed companies, investor relations and communications, access to capital for SMEs with implications in Romania/ Central European region represent areas of interest for ARIR.
Specifically, ARIR follows the following EU initiatives and their implications for listed companies: Capital Markets Union; Electronic Single Electronic Format Reporting; MIFID II;Shareholders Rights Directive II.
